title: CIAliens, USA’s Fave Gatorade 12.18.20
itunes:title: CIAliens, USA’s Fave Gatorade 12.18.20
description:
In episode 782, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Guy Montgomery to discuss the new stimulus checks, Trump pardons, Trump's fight with Palm Beach, a former DIA director on UFO's, the most popular Gatorade flavor, blowing up Trump's Atlantic City casino, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Staring Down Deadline, Congress Nears $900 Billion Stimulus Deal
  2. Weekly jobless claims rise to 885,000 as Congress nears stimulus deal
  3. 'It's turned crazy': Inside the scramble for Trump pardons
  4. Trump, Lifelong New Yorker, Declares Himself a Resident of Florida
  5. Trump is renovating Mar-a-Lago, ostensibly preparing for life post-presidency.
  6. Mar-a-Lago neighbors to Trump: Spend your post-presidency elsewhere
  7. Trump made Florida his official residence. He may have also made a legal mess.
  8. Trump's War With Palm Beach
  9. John O. Brennan on UFOs
  10. Parched Americans can't stop chugging Cool Blue Gatorade
  11. Atlantic City Is Auctioning Off the Right to Demolish a Former Trump Casino
  12. WATCH: Nate Mercereau - This Simulation Is A Good One [Video by Hunter Lyon]

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
